PluginViewModel.Name: Search OPC UA Servers
PluginViewModel.Author: Kathrin Bott, Pascal Habiger and Armin Karle (Supervision: Prof. Rainer Drath) Hochschule Pforzheim
PluginViewModel.Description: This AutomationML Editor plugin called 'Search OPC UA Servers' is used to Ô¨Ånd any number of OPC UA servers in a local network. It is possible to discover OPC UA servers to get their live status and relevant information.
